response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $15,000 to us, reflecting its quality, functionality, and uniqueness. We're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $13,500, hoping to make this opportunity accessible while ensuring we receive a fair return for our investment. We believe this offer presents a compelling value proposition for both parties and looks forward to discussing how this product can enhance your experience. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product, and we hope to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 13500}
